short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed to help you create deeper, more meaningful connections with the important people in your life.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meaningful helps professionals unlock the power of their network.

We all forget names sometimes, but with Meaningful, those awkward encounters are a thing of the past. Our innovative service uses keywords to help you instantly recall the names of your connections, strengthening your professional relationships and maximizing your networking potential.
